short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display ChatGPT response alongside search engine results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension enables the display of ChatGPT's response alongside search results from popular search engines such as Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo. 
Features:
* Supports all popular search engines
* Supports official OpenAI API (Both GPT-3.5-Turbo and GPT-3)
* Supports ChatGPT Plus and GPT-4 (GPT-4 requires manual enable in options)
* Access ChatGPT from extension popup
* Markdown rendering
* Code highlights
* Dark mode
* Feedback to improve ChatGPT
